text:
[Verse]
Underneath the pale moonlight
Stars are shining oh so bright
Feel the rhythm in our feet
Dancing to the midnight beat

[Verse 2]
Shadow play across the sand
Music carried through the land
We sway close and lose control
Nighttime makes our spirits whole

[Chorus]
Moonlight dance we're feeling free
Spin and twirl for all to see
In the night we find romance
Come join us in this moonlight dance

[Verse 3]
Waves are crashing soft and slow
Heartbeats race with every glow
Laughter fills the evening air
Moments like these are rare

[Bridge]
Hands held tight beneath the sky
Let our worries say goodbye
Lost in this enchanting trance
Under the moon we take a chance

[Chorus]
Moonlight dance we're feeling free
Spin and twirl for all to see
In the night we find romance
Come join us in this moonlight dance
title: Moonlight Dance
